data.title: Carmelo Anthony Trade: New York Knicks Send Raymond Felton and Co. for Melo
data.meta_description: The much-anticipated "Melo Saga" is finally over.   The  Denver Post  has reported that the  Denver Nuggets  have traded Carmelo Anthony to the  New York Knicks .   Check out the  fantasy implications ...
data.text:
Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images

The much-anticipated "Melo Saga" is finally over.

The Denver Post has reported that the Denver Nuggets have traded Carmelo Anthony to the New York Knicks.

Check out the fantasy implications.

Here is the breakdown of the three-team blockbuster trade:

To the Nuggets

Raymond Felton

Wilson Chandler

Danilo Gallinari

Timofey Mozgov

Corey Brewer

To the Knicks

Carmelo Anthony

Chauncey Billups

Sheldon Williams

Anthony Carter

Renaldo Balkman

To the Timberwolves

Anthony Randolph

Eddy Curry
